subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Brian Gionta scored the only goal of a shootout yesterday and Martin Brodeur ended the game with a glove save on a wrist shot by Ilya Kovalchuk in the Devils’ 3-2 victory over the visiting Atlanta Thrashers. The Devils won their seventh consecutive game.
